documents.content: Name: Locket of the Iron Solari
Name: The Tears of My Enemies
Name: Do You Know Who I Am?

metadata.name: Do You Know Who I Am?

documents.content: Name: 2 star Zac, Aurora, Urgot, and Samira

metadata.name: 2 star Zac, Aurora, Urgot, and Samira

documents.content:
Name: Bastion Crest
Description: Gain a Bastion Emblem.

Name: Battle Academia Crest
Description: Gain a Battle Academia Emblem.

Name: Crystal Gambit Crest
Description: Gain a Crystal Gambit Emblem.

Name: Duelist Crest
Description: Gain a Duelist Emblem.

Name: Executioner Crest
Description: Gain an Executioner Emblem.

Name: Edgelord Crest
Description: Gain an Edgelord Emblem.

Name: Wraith Crest
Description: Gain a Wraith Emblem.

Name: Luchador Crest
Description: Gain a Luchador Emblem.

Name: Heavyweight Crest
Description: Gain a Heavyweight Emblem.

Name: Sorcerer Crest
Description: Gain an Sorcerer Emblem.

Name: Prodigy Crest
Description: Gain a Prodigy Emblem.

Name: Protector Crest
Description: Gain a Protector Emblem.

Name: Juggernaut Crest
Description: Gain a Juggernaut Emblem.

Name: Soul Fighter Crest
Description: Gain a Soul Fighter Emblem.

Name: Star Guardian Crest
Description: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem.

Name: Supreme Cells Crest
Description: Gain a Supreme Cells Emblem.

Name: Bastion Circlet
Description: Gain a Bastion Emblem, a Giant's Belt, and a Leona.

Name: Bastion Crown
Description: Gain a Bastion Emblem, an Evenshroud, and a Xin Zhao.

Name: Battle Academia Circlet
Description: Gain a Battle Academia Emblem and a Garen.

Name: Battle Academia Crown
Description: Gain a Battle Academia Emblem, a Spirit Visage, and a Garen.

Name: Crystal Gambit Circlet
Description: Gain a Crystal Gambit Emblem and a Janna.

Name: Crystal Gambit Crown
Description: Gain a Crystal Gambit Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, and a Janna.

Name: Duelist Circlet
Description: Gain a Duelist Emblem, an Ashe, and a BF Sword.

Name: Duelist Crown
Description: Gain a Duelist Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Kayle.

Name: Executioner Circlet
Description: Gain an Executioner Emblem, an Akali, and a Sparring Gloves.

Name: Executioner Crown
Description: Gain a Executioner Emblem, a Striker's Flail, and a Katarina.

Name: Edgelord Crown
Description: Gain an Edgelord Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and a Shen.

Name: Edgelord Circlet
Description: Gain an Edgelord Emblem, a Samira, and a Recurve Bow.

Name: Wraith Circlet
Description: Gain a Wraith Emblem and a Zac.

Name: Wraith Crown
Description: Gain a Wraith Emblem, a Sunfire Cape, and a Zac.

Name: Heavyweight Circlet
Description: Gain a Heavyweight Emblem, a Poppy, and a Giant's Belt.

Name: Heavyweight Crown
Description: Gain a Heavyweight Emblem, a Spirit Visage, and a Kobuko.

Name: Luchador Circlet
Description: Gain a Luchador Emblem and a Dr Mundo.

Name: Luchador Crown
Description: Gain a Luchador Emblem, a Titan's Resolve, and a Dr Mundo.

Name: Sorcerer Circlet
Description: Gain an Sorcerer Emblem, a Karma, and a Tear of the Goddess.

Name: Sorcerer Crown
Description: Gain a Sorcerer Emblem, a Blue Buff, and a Lux.

Name: Prodigy Circlet
Description: Gain a Prodigy Emblem, a Yuumi, and a Needlessly Large Rod.

Name: Prodigy Crown
Description: Gain a Prodigy Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and an Ezreal.

Name: Protector Circlet
Description: Gain a Protector Emblem, a K'Sante, and a Giant's Belt.

Name: Protector Crown
Description: Gain a Protector Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Kennen.

Name: Juggernaut Circlet
Description: Gain a Juggernaut Emblem, a Sett, and a Giant's Belt.

Name: Juggernaut Crown
Description: Get a Juggernaut Emblem, a Strerak's Gage, and an Aatrox.

Name: Soul Fighter Circlet
Description: Gain a Soul Fighter Emblem and a Kalista.

Name: Soul Fighter Crown
Description: Gain a Soul Fighter Emblem, a Nashor's Tooth, and a Kalista.

Name: Star Guardian Crown
Description: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem, a Steadfast Heart, and a Rell.

Name: Star Guardian Circlet
Description: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem and a Rell.

Name: Supreme Cells Circlet
Description: Gain a Supreme Cells Emblem and a Kai'sa.

Name: Supreme Cells Crown
Description: Gain a Supreme Cells Emblem, a Last Whisper, and a Kai'sa.

Name: Perfect Form
Description: Gain a Zac. Your strongest Zac becomes a Specialist. He now bounces around the battlefield dealing damage in a one hex radius.

Name: Give 'em the Chair!
Description: Gain a Dr. Mundo. Your strongest Dr. Mundo becomes a Ranged Marksman. He now throws chairs that deal heavy damage, but cost Health.

Name: Class President
Description: Combat start: Powered Up Battle Academia champions and allies adjacent to one gain 70 Health, 8% AD, and 8% AP. Battle Academia units gain double. Gain a Katarina

Name: Transfer Students
Description: At the start of every stage and after every carousel round, gain 2 random 1-3 cost Battle Academia champions. Gain an Ezreal.

Name: Hero 101
Description: The first time you win 4 player combats (Wins: <placeholder>), all Battle Academia champions gain 100 Health and 15% reduced max Mana. Gain a Garen and Ezreal.

Name: Tiny Team
Description: When you field 3 or less Star Guardians, increase Star Guardian bonuses by 175%. Gain a Syndra and Rell.

Name: Power of Friendship
Description: Star Guardians who start combat adjacent to at least one other Star Guardian gain 2 Mana Regeneration, 15 Armor, and 15 Magic Resist.

Name: Tournament Titans Description: Luchadors gain 5% Attack Speed. Whenever you win player combats, Luchadors grow in size and permanently gain 2 Attack Damage and 30 Health. Gain a Dr Mundo and Gnar.

(Total: % AD; Health)

Name: Grand Slam
Description: When Luchador is active, Luchadors leap into battle at combat start. Luchador leaps deal 300% of their Basic Attack Damage. Gain a Gnar.

Name: Escape Velocity Description: Gain 1 Velocity per reroll, and 6 when you level up. Crew units gain 1% Attack Speed for every 3 Velocity.

(Velocity: )

Name: Precise Shot
Description: Every 4 seconds, all Sniper champions fire a shot that deals 85% of their Basic Attack Damage to the lowest health enemy in range. Gain a Jhin.

Name: Sniper Crown
Description: Gain a Sniper Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and a Jhin.

Name: Sniper Circlet
Description: Gain a Sniper Emblem, a Jinx, and a Recurve Bow.

Name: Aim For The Top! Description: You are more likely to fight stronger players, and you know who you will fight. When you lose, gain 2 XP. Every 3 wins, gain a component.

Foes vanquished:

Name: Tectonic Titan
Description: Gain a Malphite. Your strongest Malphite becomes a Fighter, gaining increased Attack Speed. He now charges at nearby enemies, knocking them up and dealing heavy damage.

Name: Power Upload Description: You can give the Mighty Mech a Power Up. When it has Power Up the Mighty Mech gains 150 Health and 10% Damage Amp.

Gain an Aatrox, a Senna, and a Power Remover.

Name: Space Camp
Description: Whenever you star-up a Crew champion, gain a random bonus 1 or 2 cost Crew champion. Gain a Malphite.

Name: The God's Eye Opens
Description: Every 4 seconds the God's Eye grants a random Soul Fighter 200 shield and 12% stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat. Gain a Kalista and Naafiri.

Name: Diamond Hands
Description: Gain 50% more total Gems from Crystal Gambit, but you can only cash out once, on 4-7. While Double Down is active, winning loses an additional 10% of your total Gems rather than cashing out.

Name: Teacher's Council
Description: Mentor bonuses are increased by 10%, and granted to your team regardless of how many Mentors you play. Gain an Udyr.

Name: Deepening Shadows
Description: At combat start and whenever the Shadow Realm strikes, Wraith champions gain 5% Attack Damage and 5 Ability Power. Gain a Jhin and Zac.

Name: The Darkness Within
Description: The first 3 Wraith champions to die each combat summon a monstrosity from the Shadow Realm. Gain a Jhin and Zac.

Name: Schoolyard Justice
Description: Gain a Garen. Your strongest Garen becomes a Fighter. He no longer Heals, but deals more damage and executes weak enemies.

Name: Adaptive Style
Description: On attack, Duelists gain 2 Attack Damage and Ability Power, stacking up to 15 times. Duelist Tanks instead gain 2 Armor and Magic Resist. Gain a Kai'Sa and Kayle.

Name: Starfall
Description: Gain a Neeko. Your strongest Neeko becomes a Magic Fighter and gains increased Attack Speed. Her Ability heals more, deals more damage, and increases its radius with every cast.

Name: I'll Be The Legs Description: The Mighty Mech gains 15 Armor and Magic Resist and 100 Health. Gain 3 Mighty Mech champions.

Field 7 Mighty Mech, reach level 10, and hold all 3 Mighty Mech Augments to activate MECHA-MERGE PROTOCOL.

Name: I'll Be The Arms Description: The Mighty Mech gains 60% Attack Speed. Gain a Senna and Gangplank.

Field 7 Mighty Mech, reach level 10, and hold all 3 Mighty Mech Augments to activate MECHA-MERGE PROTOCOL.

Name: Dazzling Display
Description: Enemies who take damage from Sorcerer Abilities deal 25 less damage for 6 seconds. Gain a Lux and a Lucian.

Name: Ring The Bell
Description: After 15 seconds, your Heavyweight champions gain 30% max Health and 20% Damage Amp. Gain a Kobuko and a Zac.

Name: The Strongest Survive
Description: Whenever an ally dies, they grant the Supreme Cell with the most damage this round 8% of their maximum health. Gain a Kai'Sa and Kennen.

Name: Preemptive Protection
Description: Combat start: Protectors shield themselves and their closest ally for 14% of their maximum health. Shields stack. Gain a Rakan.

Name: Golden Guillotine
Description: Executioner kills have a chance to drop loot, scaling with Critical Strike Chance. The value of the loot given can also critically strike, granting even more loot. Gain a Katarina and Kalista.

Name: Gain The Edge
Description: Edgelords now gain up to 200% of their Attack Speed bonus the lower health their target is. Gain a Shen and Xayah.

Name: Solo Leveling
Description: For the next 5 combats, your team size is 1 but the champion you field has massively increased stats. Gain 1 XP for every kill they get. Afterwards, gain 2 item components.

Name: Learn From The Best
Description: Whenever you star-up a champion they permanently gain 50% of your unique owned Mentor champion's Mentor bonus. Gain a Yasuo.

Name: Raid Boss
Description: Your strongest Bastion champion gains 20% max Health. When other Bastions die, they transfer 20% of their Armor and Magic Resist to it. Gain a Shen and Rell.

Name: Tournament Favorites Description: Soul Fighters gain Fame when they deal damage. Each Fame breakpoint grants loot. Gain a Naafiri and Kalista.

Fame: /

Name: Unceasing
Description: Whenever an ally Juggernaut dies, all other Juggernauts gain a 10% max Health shield for 5 seconds and gain 2% more Durability. Gain an Aatrox and Dr. Mundo.

Name: Nine Thousand Volts
Description: Gain a Kennen. Your strongest Kennen becomes a ranged Marksman. He throws piercing Shurikens that can stun and deal true damage.

Name: Twilight Assault
Description: Gain a Shen. Your strongest Shen becomes a ranged Marksman gaining +3 Range. His ability no longer shields but instead deals additional damage.

Name: New Contenders
Description: Grant 50% of Supreme Cell's bonus to all champions on your team. Any champion on your team can now become the Supreme Cell. Gain a Kai'Sa and Kennen.

Name: Knuckledusters
Description: Gain a Vi. Your strongest Vi becomes an Attack Fighter. She now deals heavy single target damage and gains Attack Damage for item components equipped on your team.

Name: Burning Bright
Description: Gain an Udyr. Your strongest Udyr becomes an Attack Fighter and sends bouncing gusts of flame out with every attack. His spell no longer rapidly attacks, but instead grants him stacking Attack Speed.

Name: Game Plan
Description: Mark 1 hex per Strategist fielded. Allies standing in marked hexes gain 200 Health and 12% Damage Amp, Strategists gain 100% more. Gain a Janna and Ziggs.

Name: And I'll Be The Head Description: The Mighty Mech gains 400 Health, 10% Damage Amp, and 10% Durability.

Field 7 Mighty Mech, reach level 10, and hold all 3 Mighty Mech Augments to activate MECHA-MERGE PROTOCOL.
Name: Isekai Description: Summon a magical hero from another universe to fight for you. This hero is a Prodigy this game. Gain a Hand of Justice.
Name: Isekai Description: Summon a magical hero from another universe to fight for you. This hero is a Sorcerer this game. Gain a Hand of Justice.
Name: Isekai Description: Summon a magical hero from another universe to fight for you. This hero is a Strategist this game. Gain a Hand of Justice.

Name: Strategist Circlet
Description: Gain a Strategist Emblem, a Ryze, and a Tear of the Goddess.

Name: Strategist Crest
Description: Gain a Strategist Emblem.

Name: And I'll Be The Head Description: The Mighty Mech gains 800 Health, 25% Damage Amp, and 15% Durability.

Field 7 Mighty Mech, reach level 10, and hold all 3 Mighty Mech Augments to activate MECHA-MERGE PROTOCOL.

Name: Portable Forge Description: Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

Name: Recombobulator
Description: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher (max 5). Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

Name: Living Forge Description: Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 10 player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

Name: Prismatic Ticket
Description: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 45% chance to gain a free reroll.

Name: Young and Wild and Free
Description: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 5 gold.

Name: Latent Forge Description: After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.
Name: Silver Spoon Description: Gain 10 XP.

Name: Component Buffet Description: Whenever you would get a component, gain a component anvil instead. Gain a random component.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

Name: Iron Assets
Description: Gain a component anvil and 4 gold.

Name: Ones Twos Three
Description: Gain 2 1-cost champion, 2 2-cost champions, and 1 3-cost champion.

Name: Missed Connections
Description: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

Name: Roll The Dice Description: Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

Name: Buried Treasures III
Description: Gain a random item component at the start of the next 6 rounds (including this round).

Name: Pandora's Items Description: Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random component.

Name: Pandora's Items III Description: Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

Name: Pandora's Items II Description: Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 2 random components.

Name: Team Building Description: Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 5 player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

Name: Risky Moves
Description: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.

Name: One, Two, Five!
Description: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

Name: Pumping Up I
Description: Your team gains 6% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.5% more. (current Attack Speed: <placeholder>%)

Name: Pumping Up II
Description: Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more. (current Attack Speed: <placeholder>%)

Name: Pumping Up III
Description: Your team gains 12% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more. (current Attack Speed: <placeholder>%)

Name: Tiniest Titan
Description: Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

Name: Trade Sector
Description: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 4 gold.

Name: Level Up!
Description: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 12 immediately.

Name: Patient Study
Description: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.

Name: Radiant Relics Description: Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

Name: Item Grab Bag I
Description: Gain 1 random completed item.

Name: Lategame Specialist
Description: When you reach Level 9, gain 33 gold.

Name: Shopping Spree
Description: When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level+1. Gain 2 gold.

Name: Caretaker's Ally Description: Gain a random 2-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

Champion:

Name: Caretaker's Favor Description: Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

Name: Caretaker's Chosen Description: As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: Component anvil
Level 6: Completed item anvil
Level 7: Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items

Name: Heroic Grab Bag Description: Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators. Gain 7 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

Name: Clear Mind
Description: If there are no champions on your bench at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

Name: Cluttered Mind
Description: Gain 4 random 1-cost champions now. If your bench is full at the end of player combat, gain 3 XP.

Name: Going Long Description: You no longer gain interest. Gain 15 gold now. Round start: gain 4 XP.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

Name: Scapegoat
Description: Gain a Training Dummy and 4 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.

Name: Good For Something I
Description: Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% chance to drop 1 gold on death.

Name: Lucky Gloves
Description: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

Name: Lucky Gloves+
Description: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

Name: Tiniest Titan+
Description: Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster. Gain 15 gold now.

Name: Teaming Up I
Description: Gain 1 random component and 2 random Tier 3 champions.

Name: Big Grab Bag Description: Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and 1 Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

Name: Little Buddies
Description: Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 55 Health and 6% Attack Speed  for every 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.

Name: Band of Thieves I
Description: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

Name: Wandering Trainer II
Description: Gain a Training Dummy with 3 permanently attached Emblems. Gain 6 gold.

Name: Branching Out
Description: Gain a random Emblem.

Name: Wandering Trainer I
Description: Gain a Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Emblems. Gain 1 gold.

Name: Raining Gold
Description: Gain 8 gold now and 1 gold every round.

Name: Raining Gold+
Description: Gain 18 gold now and 1 gold every round.

Name: Worth the Wait II Description: Gain a random 2-cost champion. Gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

Champion:

Name: Worth the Wait Description: Gain a random 2-star 1-cost champion. After 2 rounds, gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

Champion:

Name: Radiant Refactor Description: Gain a Masterwork Upgrade and 1 component anvil.

Masterwork Upgrade upgrades an item to Radiant!

Name: Prizefighter
Description: Gain 2 item components. Every 5 wins gives you an item component.

Name: Call to Chaos Description: Gain a powerful and random reward.

Reward:

Name: Slammin'
Description: Gain 1 random component(s). After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than consumables), gain 2 XP.

Name: Slammin'+
Description: Gain 1 random component(s) and 10 XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than consumables), gain 2 XP.

Name: Scoreboard Scrapper
Description: Every round, if you're in the bottom 4, your team permanently gains 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power. If you're in the Top 4, they have 10% more Health.

Name: Lunch Money Description: Every 8 damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you 2 gold.
Total Payouts: Gold

Name: Over Encumbered
Description: For the next stage, you only get 2 bench slots. After, get 2 item components.

Name: Epoch
Description: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 4 XP and 2 free rerolls.

Name: Epoch+
Description: Now, and at the start of every stage, gain 8 XP and 3 free rerolls.

Name: ReinFOURcement
Description: The next 4-cost champion you buy is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 12 gold.

Name: Build a Bud!
Description: Gain a random 3-star 1-cost champion. Gain 8 gold.

Name: Spoils of War I
Description: Enemies have a 25% chance to drop loot when killed.

Name: Spoils of War II
Description: Enemies have a 30% chance to drop loot when killed.

Name: Spoils of War III
Description: Enemies have a 45% chance to drop loot when killed.

Name: Called Shot
Description: Set your win streak to 4. Gain 4 gold.

Name: All That Shimmers
Description: Choose a gold-generating Artifact item and gain a Magnetic Remover.

Name: Flexible
Description: Gain 1 random emblem. At the start of every Stage, gain a random emblem. Your team gains 20 Health for each emblem they are holding.

Name: All That Shimmers+
Description: Choose a gold-generating Artifact. Gain a Magnetic Remover and 4 gold.

Name: Restart Mission
Description: Remove all champions on your board and bench. Gain 2 random 2-star 3-costs, 3 2-star 2-costs, and 1 2-star 1-cost champion.

Name: Thorn-Plated Armor
Description: Gain a Bramble Vest. Your Bramble Vests deal 1-180% more damage (based on Stage) and heal the holder for 30% of the damage dealt.

Name: Placebo
Description: Your team gains 1% Attack Speed. Gain 8 gold.

Name: Upward Mobility
Description: Buying XP costs 1 less. Gain 2 Health and 2 free rerolls whenever you level up.

Name: Patience is a Virtue
Description: Each round, gain 2 free rerolls if you did not buy a champion last round.

Name: Shimmerscale Essence Description: Gain a Mogul's Mail. In 5 rounds, gain a Gamblers Blade.

These items give gold as well as combat power.

Name: High Voltage
Description: Gain an Ionic Spark. Your Ionic Sparks have +3 hex radius and do 15% more damage.

Name: Pilfer
Description: Each round, gain a 1-star copy of the first champion you killed last combat.

Name: Hard Commit
Description: Gain a random emblem. Now and at the start of each stage, gain a 1-star champion of that trait with a cost equal to the Stage (max 5) and 2 gold.

Name: Invested+
Description: Gain 26 gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

Name: Invested++
Description: Gain 45 gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

Name: Item Collector I
Description: For each unique item they are holding, your team gains 1 Attack Damage and 1 Ability Power.

Name: Item Collector II
Description: Your team gains 20 Health. For each unique item they are holding, your team gains bonus 5 Health, 1 Attack Damage, and 1 Ability Power.

Name: Replication
Description: Choose 1 of 3 components. For the next 2 rounds, gain a copy of that component.

Name: Placebo+
Description: Your team gains 1% Attack Speed. Gain 15 gold.

Name: Duo Queue
Description: Gain 2 random 5-cost champions and 2 copies of a random component.

Name: Find Your Center
Description: Your champion that starts combat in the center of the front row gains 15% Damage Amp and 15% max Health.

Name: Pandora's Bench
Description: At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost. Gain 2 gold.

Name: Hedge Fund Description: Gain 25 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

Name: Dummify
Description: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Training Dummy with 80% of their combined health. The dummy gains 1000 Health per stage.

Name: Delayed Start
Description: Sell your board and bench. Gain 4 random 2-star 1-cost champions. Disable your Shop for the next 3 rounds.

Name: Survivor
Description: After 3 players are eliminated, gain 92 gold.

Name: Tactician's Kitchen
Description: Gain a random Emblem. After 6 player combats, gain a Tactician's Cape.

Name: Crafted Crafting
Description: Whenever you craft a completed item, gain 2 rerolls.

Name: Malicious Monetization
Description: Gain 2 gold. For the next 3 rounds, enemy champions drop 2 gold when killed.

Name: Coronation
Description: Gain a Tactician's Crown. Tactician's Crown, Shield, and Cape grant the holder an additional 20% Attack Speed, 25% Attack Damage, and 30 Ability Power.

Name: One Buff, Two Buff
Description: Gain a Red Buff, a Blue Buff, and a Champion Duplicator.
Name: Moonlight Description: Combat start: 1 random 1-cost champion is upgraded to 3-star for that round and gains 45% Attack Damage and 45 Ability Power.

Name: Bronze For Life I Description: Your team gains 3% Damage Amp for each Bronze-tier trait.

Damage Amp Bonus: %

Name: Bronze For Life II Description: Your team gains 3.5% Damage Amp and 1% Durability for each Bronze-tier trait.

Damage Amp Bonus: %
Durability Bonus: %

Name: Two Trick
Description: Gain a random 2-star 2-cost and 2 random 2-star 1-cost champions.

Name: Trifecta I Description: Gain 2 3-cost champions.
Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 220 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

Name: Trifecta II Description: Gain 3 3-cost champions. Allies gain 5% Attack Speed.
Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 300 Health and 25% Attack Speed.

Name: Vampiric Vitality
Description: You heal for 12% of the damage you deal to enemy Tacticians. Your units gain 12% Omnivamp.

Name: Diversified Portfolio Description: Gain 1 gold. Each round, gain 1 gold for every 3 non-unique traits active.

Gold Bonus:

Name: Diversified Portfolio+ Description: Gain 4 gold. Each round, gain 1 gold for every 3 non-unique traits active.

Gold Bonus:

Name: Pyromaniac
Description: Gain a Red Buff. Your Burns deal 50% increased damage.

Name: Golemify
Description: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Golem with 60% of their combined Health and 50% of their combined Attack Damage. The Golem gains 1000 Health per stage.

Name: Lineup
Description: Your team gains 2 Armor and Magic Resist for each unit that starts combat in the front two rows.

Name: Prismatic Pipeline
Description: The next non-player combat round will drop an additional Prismatic Orb full of amazing loot.

Name: Quality Over Quantity Description: Champions holding exactly 1 item upgrade that item to Radiant. Champions holding Radiant items gain 4% Health. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

Thief's Gloves counts as multiple items.

Name: Belt Overflow
Description: Gain 5 Giant's Belts. Your Giant's Belts grant +60 bonus Health.

Name: Wand Overflow
Description: Gain 5 Needlessly Large Rods. Your Needlessly Large Rods grant +5% Attack Speed.

Name: Sword Overflow
Description: Gain 5 BF Swords. Your BF Swords grant +2% Attack Speed.

Name: Table Scraps
Description: After the next 2 carousels, gain one champion that was not taken and its item. Gain 1 gold.

Name: Sponging
Description: Combat start: Up to 6 champions with 1 or fewer items gain a copy of a random completed item from the nearest itemized ally.

Name: Scavenger
Description: The first 5 enemy champions that are killed each combat grant a champion on your team a temporary completed item.

Name: Tower Defense
Description: Gain a Training Dummy equipped with a random emblem that fires ranged attacks at enemies. It upgrades as the game goes on.

Name: Kingslayer
Description: After winning player combat, gain 1 gold. If they had more health than you, gain 6 Gold instead. Gain 1 gold.

Name: Max Cap
Description: Your max level is 7. Gain 1 Tactician's Shield which increases your team size by +1, and 50 gold.

Name: Crown's Will
Description: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 10 Ability Power and 8 Armor.

Name: Spear's Will
Description: Your team gains 10% Attack Damage and 5 Mana. Gain a B.F. Sword.

Name: A Magic Roll Description: Roll 3 dice. Gain rewards based on their total.

Reward:

Name: Mace's Will
Description: Gain a Sparring Gloves. Your team gains 6% Attack Speed and 20% Critical Strike Chance.

Name: Tomb Raider I
Description: For the next 3 players eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.

Name: Two Much Value
Description: Gain 1 reroll for every 2 unique two-cost champions fielded last combat. Gain 2 two-cost unit.

Name: An Exalted Adventure Description: Gain three 2-cost champions. If you 3-star two of them, gain an orb filled with loot. Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator at the start of next 2 stages.

Champions: , ,

Name: Expected Unexpectedness
Description: Now and at the start of the next 2 stages, roll 3 dice. Gain various rewards based on their total.

Name: Rigged Shop+
Description: Your next shop and every 4 shops will contain all 3-cost champions. Gain 5 rerolls.

Name: Pair of Fours
Description: If your team has exactly 2 4-cost champions, they each gain 374 Health and 24.4% Attack Speed. Gain a random 4-cost.

Name: Gold For Dummies
Description: Gain a Training Dummy. Every 10 seconds, all Training Dummies grant 1 gold.

Name: Blazing Soul I
Description: Combat start: Your highest Attack Speed champion gains 20 Ability Power and 20% Attack Speed. Repeat on another ally every 3 seconds.

Name: Blazing Soul II
Description: Combat start: Your highest Attack Speed champion gains 35 Ability Power and 35% Attack Speed. Repeat on another ally every 3 seconds.

Name: Corrosion
Description: Enemy champions in the first two rows lose 3 Armor and Magic Resist every 2 seconds.

Name: Sated Spellweaver
Description: After casting an Ability, champions gain 15% Omnivamp for 3 seconds. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 500 Health.

Name: Firesale
Description: Each round, steal a random 3-cost or lower champion from the shop. Gain 1 gold.

Name: Titanic Titan
Description: Increase your current and max player health by 25. On carousel rounds you are released earlier, but are much slower.

Name: Investment Strategy I
Description: Your champions gain 7 permanent max Health per interest you earn.

Name: Glass Cannon I
Description: Units that start combat in the back row begin combat at 90% health but gain 13% Damage Amp.

Name: Investment Strategy II
Description: Your champions gain 8 permanent max Health per interest you earn. Your max interest is increased to 7. Gain 3 gold.

Name: Glass Cannon II
Description: Units that start combat in the back row begin combat at 90% health but gain 20% Damage Amp.

Name: Overheal
Description: Every third attack deals an additional 110% damage and heals 50% of the damage. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

Name: Warpath Description: Gain a 2-star 2-cost champion. After dealing 80 player damage, gain a chest of high cost champions and items.
(Current: )

Name: Eye For An Eye Description: For every 15 ally champions that die, gain a random component (max 3).

Deaths Remaining:

Name: Eye For An Eye+ Description: Gain a random component. For every 16 ally champions that die, gain another component (max 2).

Deaths Remaining:

Name: Climb The Ladder I
Description: Each time an ally dies, allies that share at least one trait with them gain 3 Ability Power, 3% Attack Damage, 3 Armor, and 3 Magic Resist.

Name: Noble Sacrifice
Description: When your first ally dies each combat, grant your team 25 + 10% of that ally's Armor and Magic Resistance.

Name: Cloning Facility
Description: Empower the hex in the center of the third row. Summon a clone of the champion in it with 80% base Health and 10% increased Mana cost.

Name: Climb The Ladder II
Description: Each time an ally dies, allies that share at least one trait with them gain 5 Ability Power, 5% Attack Damage, 5 Armor, and 5 Magic Resist.

Name: Tomb Raider II
Description: Gain 1 completed item anvil. Every time a player is eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.

Name: Spirit Link
Description: Champions restore 5% of their max Health every 4 seconds. Increase the healing by 0.5% for every 10 missing player Health.

Name: Rolling For Days I
Description: Gain 11 free Shop rerolls.

Name: Salvage Bin
Description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

Name: Salvage Bin+
Description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

Name: Salvage Bin
Description: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 3 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's items and Emblems).

Name: Birthday Present
Description: Gain a 2-star champion and 1 gold every time you level up. The champion's cost tier is your level minus 4 (max: 5-cost).

Name: Branching Out+ Description: Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

Name: Heroic Grab Bag+ Description: Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators. Gain 9 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

Name: Heroic Grab Bag++ Description: Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators. Gain 13 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

Name: Cooking Pot
Description: At the start of each turn, all units holding a Frying Pan or Spatula item grant the nearest champion 40 permanent Health. Gain a Frying Pan.

Name: Stand United I
Description: Your units gain 1.5% Attack Damage and 1.5 Ability Power for each non-unique Trait active across your team.

Name: Preparation II
Description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 45 Health, 3% Attack Damage, and 3 Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

Name: Preparation I
Description: Champions on your bench permanently gain 30 Health, 2% Attack Damage, and 2 Ability Power every round. Champions start with 1 stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

Name: AFK
Description: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.

Name: Big Friend I
Description: Your units that start combat next to an ally with over 1750 Health gain 7% Durability.

Name: Big Friend II
Description: Your units that start combat next to an ally with over 1750 Health gain 10% Durability.

Name: Cybernetic Uplink III
Description: Your champions holding an item gain 180 Health and restore 3 Mana per second.

Name: Cybernetic Uplink II
Description: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

Name: Hustler Description: You earn no interest, but gain 3 gold at the start of every player combat round. Gain 3 gold now.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

Name: Calculated Loss
Description: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop reroll.

Name: Ascension
Description: After 15 seconds of combat, your units gain 60% Damage Amp.

Name: Final Ascension
Description: Your team gains 15% Damage Amp. After 15 seconds, this increases to 45% Damage Amp.

Name: Healing Orbs I
Description: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 200.

Name: Healing Orbs II
Description: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 400.

Name: Plot Armor
Description: Your team gains 10 Armor and Magic Resist. After falling below 50% health, increase this to 40 for the rest of combat.

Name: Time Skip
Description: Disable your Shop for the next 3 rounds. Then gain 28 XP.

Name: Silver Destiny
Description: Gain a random Silver Augment and 4 gold.

Name: Silver Destiny+
Description: Gain a random Silver Augment and 8 gold.

Name: Silver Destiny++
Description: Gain a random Silver Augment and 10 gold.

Name: Gold Destiny
Description: Gain a random Gold Augment and 6 gold.

Name: Gold Destiny+
Description: Gain a random Gold Augment and 12 gold.

Name: Prismatic Destiny
Description: Gain a random Prismatic Augment and 8 gold.

Name: Protagonist
Description: Gain a random 1-cost Champion Augment and a component item Anvil. Gain a copy of the champion at the start of every turn.

Name: A Story of Seven Description: Collect Golden Balls by defeating players in combat. Collect all 7 for a reward, then restart the quest with more powerful rewards.

Gain a 2-star 1-cost champion to start your journey.

Name: Efficient Shopper
Description: For the next 4 carousels, gain a second copy of the champion taken.

Name: Trickster's Treat
Description: Get a Trickster's Glass. Your Trickster's Glass summons clones every 9 seconds, but each additional clone has  40% Max Health and 120% Max Mana.

Name: Tesla Coil
Description: Each of your allies with 3 items equipped emits 2 arcs of lightning every 5 seconds, dealing 250-375 magic damage based on stage.

Name: Hard Bargain Description: You cannot choose your Carousel rewards. Gain an additional 4 player health and 9 gold each carousel round.
When you do not pick a Carousel Reward, you are given an unpicked champion and the item it carries

Name: Howling Gale
Description: For every 600 Mana your team spends, summon a whirlwind that knocks up enemies.

Name: Evil Beyond Measure
Description: Your champions deal 4.5% of their damage as True Damage for each Star level.

Name: Hefty Rolls Description: Your team gains 7 Health and size for each time you've rolled this game.

Rolls: Health:

Name: Blood Rage
Description: Your units gain 5-35% Damage Amp based on their missing Health. Maximum Damage Amp gained at 30% Health.

Name: Nine Lives
Description: Set your player health to 9. On combat loss, you only lose 1 health and gain loot. You can't gain health.

Name: Chaotic Evolution
Description: Starring up a champion grants them one of the following: 100 Health, 6% Durability, 12 Ability Power, 12% Attack Damage, 10% Attack Speed. Bonuses stack.

Name: Treasure Hunt
Description: Earn a locked chest each Stage between now and Stage 6. You can unlock each chest when you spend 20 Gold on shop rerolls. These chests persist until opened.

Name: Mess Hall
Description: After 10 seconds of combat, your champions gain 20% Attack Speed and attacks also hurl delicious projectiles that deal 140% Attack Damage as magic damage.

Name: Backup Dancers
Description: Combat start:  Every 3 seconds, champions in your 3 rightmost bench slots grant your team 3.5% Attack Speed per slot.

Name: Heavy Is The Crown
Description: Gain a Crown of Demacia, which provides significant bonuses to the wearer. If the wearer dies, lose the round.

Name: Piercing Sight
Description: Enemies take 1% damage as bonus true damage, increased by 1% up to 20% every time they take damage.

Name: Lit Fuse
Description: Units that start in the back two rows split 60 total Mana after 6 seconds of combat.

Name: Hold The Line
Description: Combat Start: Champions in your back row gain 10 Ability Power and 9% Attack Damage for each champion in your front row.

Name: Unlimited Power Description: Gain a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Morellonomicon, a Needlessly Large Rod and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Magic Carries!

Name: Water Lotus I
Description: Your team gains 5% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. If an Ability critically strikes, restore 9% of your Mana over 3 seconds.

Name: Water Lotus II
Description: Your team gains 20% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. If an Ability critically strikes, restore 15% of your Mana over 3 seconds.

Name: Deadlier Caps
Description: Gain a Rabadon's Deathcap. Deathcaps gain 1 Ability Power per 4 takedowns the wearer gets.

Name: Deadlier Blades
Description: Gain a Deathblade. Deathblades gain 1% Attack Damage per 5 takedowns the wearer gets.

Name: Another One!
Description: The next completed item you make grants an additional copy of it. Gain 1 gold now.

Name: Another One!+
Description: The next completed item you make grants another copy of it. Gain 1 component.

Name: Psychic Forge
Description: Round start Completed Items on benched units turn into one of their recommended items. Gain a random completed item.

Name: Exclusive Customization Description: Gain a Lucky Item Chest and a Magnetic Remover and 5 gold.

Use a Lucky Item Chest on a champion to choose from an armory of recommended items!

Name: Cry Me A River
Description: Gain a Tear of the Goddess. Your team gains 1 Mana Regen. After 15 seconds in combat, increase this to 2.

Name: Pocket Recombobulator
Description: Get 2 Pocket Recombobulators, a consumable that transform a 1 or 2-cost champion into one of a higher cost. They keep their Star level. Also receive 2 Reforgers.

Name: Care Package
Description: Now and at the start of each stage, receive a care package with loot and 3 gold.

Name: Last Second Save
Description: The first time each ally falls below 35% Health, they restore 30% maximum Health.

Name: Augmented Power
Description: Your next augment is one tier higher.

Name: At What Cost
Description: Immediately go to level 6 and gain 4 XP. You don't get to choose your future augments.

Name: Reroll Transfer Description: For every 1 unused Augment Reroll, gain 3 free shop rerolls. Gain 3 gold.

Does not include the round this augment is selected.

Name: Beggars Can Be Choosers
Description: You get +3 Augment rerolls for all other augment choices. Gain 7 gold.

Name: Know Your Enemy Description: Your team deals 10% more damage.

Deal 15% more damage instead if you and your opponent have any of the same traits active.

Name: Tons of Stats!
Description: Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.

Name: Second Wind I
Description: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 40% of their missing Health.

Name: Best Friends I
Description: Units isolated in pairs gain 12% Attack Speed and 12 Armor at the start of combat.

Name: Best Friends II
Description: Units isolated in pairs gain 15% Attack Speed and 20 Armor at the start of combat.

Name: Sunfire Board
Description: Combat Start: Burn all enemies for 12% of their max Health over 12 seconds and reduce healing received by 33%.

Name: Keepers I
Description: Combat start: Grant units with adjacent allies a 145 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.

Name: Keepers II
Description: Combat start: Grant units with adjacent allies a 230 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.

Name: Stars are Born
Description: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 7 gold.

Name: Explosive Growth
Description: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 8 XP.

Name: Explosive Growth+
Description: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 11 XP.

Name: Starter Kit Description: Gain a 4-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them, and 4 gold.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.

Name: Double Trouble
Description: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 30% Attack Damage and 30 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

Name: The Golden Egg
Description: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

Name: Fully Adapted
Description: Gain an Adaptive Helm. Champions holding this item gain both effects.

Name: Quiet Quitting
Description: For the next 3 player combats, you cannot use your shop. After, gain 16 gold and a Completed Item Anvil.

Name: Aura Farming
Description: Gain a 2-star 5-cost champion equipped with 1 item. You cannot field it until 4-6.

Name: A Golden Quest
Description: The first time you have 165 or more gold, gain a 2-star 5-cost champion and 2 items tailored to them.

Name: Slice of Life
Description: Twice per stage, gain a random champion. Its cost increases per stage. This effect ends after receiving 2 5-cost champions.

Name: Forward Thinking Description: Lose all your gold. After 5 player combats, gain back the original amount and another 70 gold.

Incoming Gold:

Name: Golden Prelude
Description: The first augment offered this game will be gold tier.

Name: Prismatic Prelude
Description: The first augment offered this game will be prismatic tier.

Name: Golden Gala
Description: All augments offered this game will be gold tier.

Name: Prismatic Party
Description: All augments offered this game will be prismatic tier.

Name: 3-Cost Champion
Description: Start with a random 3-cost champion.

Name: Artifact Anvil
Description: Start with 1 Artifact anvil (choose a powerful item).

Name: Component Anvils
Description: Start with 2 component anvils.

Name: Champion Duplicator
Description: Start the game with a Champion Duplicator.

Name: Completed Anvil
Description: Start with 1 completed item anvil.

Name: 3 Champions
Description: Start with 3 random 1-cost champions.

Name: Pot of Gold
Description: At stage 6-1, all living players split a pot of 250 gold.

Name: Golden Finale
Description: The last augment offered this game will be gold tier.

Name: Prismatic Finale
Description: The last augment offered this game will be prismatic tier.

Name: Scuttle Puddle
Description: Monsters are replaced by crabs that drop bonus loot!

Name: Radiant Item
Description: Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items later in the game (very powerful versions of completed items).

Name: Ascending Augments
Description: Augments this game will be silver, gold, then prismatic tier.

Name: Spatula
Description: Start with a Spatula.

Name: Support Anvil
Description: Start with 1 Support item anvil.

Name: Tactician's Crown
Description: Start with a Tactician's Crown (gain +1 team size).

Name: Trainer Golems
Description: Start with a Golem with 3 permanently attached emblems.

Name: Upgraded Champion
Description: Start with a 2-star 1-cost champion.

Name: Mel's Blessing
Description: Mel will grant you powerful loot at 40 player health.

Name: Loot Subscription
Description: Every stage, gain random loot from a highly varied pool.

Name: Item Payout
Description: When you build items, gain gold.

Name: Champion Delivery
Description: Twice per stage, gain a high cost champion. The value goes up with game time.

Name: Loaded Carousels
Description: Component carousels have an extra component on each champion.

Name: Crab Rave
Description: Monsters are replaced by crabs that drop bonus loot! Giant crabs are VERY DANGEROUS.

Name: Anvil Buffet
Description: All items drop as component anvils.

Name: No encounter.
Description: There is no encounter this game.

Name: Gold Subscription
Description: Every stage, gain a random amount of gold. All players gain the same amount.

Name: Gold Opener
Description: Start with 7 more gold.

Name: Champion Conference
Description: Every stage, gain a champion that fits your team.

Name: Treasure Golems
Description: Start with a Golem permanently equipped with an Unstable Treasure Chest. Later in the game, the Golem equips a second one.

Name: Treasure Armory
Description: On stage 4-7, choose a 5-piece package of powerful loot.

Name: Frying Pan
Description: Start with a Frying Pan.

Name: Make 'Em Cook
Description: Start with a Spatula and a Frying Pan. Reforgers wont drop.

Name: S1LVER P4RTY
Description: All augments this game will be silver tier.
TFT Set 15 is the latest set of Teamfight Tactics featuring new champions, traits, and mechanics. The set introduces Power-ups as a new mechanic where champions can gain special abilities.
Power-ups in TFT Set 15 are special abilities that can be granted to champions. These are different from regular traits and provide unique gameplay mechanics.

TFT Set 15 features various traits including Bastion, Battle Academia, Destroyer (Executioner), DragonFist (Stance Master), Edgelord, Empyrean (Wraith), Heavyweight, Spellslinger (Sorcerer), Monster Trainer, Old Mentor, Prodigy, Protector, Juggernaut, Sniper, Soul Fighter, Star Guardian, Supreme Cells, Sentai Ranger (Mighty Mech), Luchador, Gem Force (Crystal Gambit), The Crew, Captain (Rogue Captain), Rosemother, Strategist, Duelist, and El Tigre (The Champ).
